title: disconecting from PVP.net all the time w/ this new patch
body: well, i just woke up today and i wont stop disconnecting from the game... i just dodged a game now cuz my game disconnected while i was selecting champion, it's happening to anyone here too?

replies.body: Thanks bro! im not having this problems anymore =)

Hey ObscurE1,

I'm sorry to hear about your connection issues!  If you are repeatedly seeing the "disconnected from PvP.net" error in the upper left hand corner of the client in a Red warning box, then this is strongly indicative of either an unstable connection, or a 3rd party security software that is negatively interacting with League of Legends.  Because of this, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article, found here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21696815

If you are still experiencing issues after completing all of these steps, then I recommend that you submit a new ticket to Player Support, which you can do here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a new ticket, make sure to provide the following latest and most up to date information:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
